text: Saman Pakbaz (, born 19 July 1995) is a paralympic athlete from Iran competing in category F11-12 shot put event. In 2015 he earned his place in the 2016 Summer Paralympics in Rio de Janeiro at the 2015 International Paralympic Committee (IPC) Athletics World Championships in Qatar earning a silver medal for Iran with a throw of . Pakbaz competed in the 2016 Summer Paralympics shot put and won the silver medal in the F11-12 shot put. ==References== Category:Paralympic athletes of Iran Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2016 Summer Paralympics Category:Paralympic silver medalists for Iran Category:Living people Category:1995 births Category:Medalists at the 2016 Summer Paralympics Category:Iranian male shot putters Category:Paralympic medalists in athletics (track and field)
title: Saman Pakbaz
